Text:
It’s not a mountain 
 But it’s still monumental 
 25 followed by three zeros 
 25 Tonnes!

It’s not a mountain 
 But it’s still monumental 
 2 followed by three zeros 
 2000!

It’s not a mountain 
 But it’s still monumental 
 10 plus 5 
 15!

25 Tonnes of e-waste - lots recyclable 
 2000 broken phones, computers, keyboards s/n 15 year old Riva Tulpule’s campaign proves 
 “Somedays headlines spell HOPE
THINK: Sameness rarely sparks creativity; valuing differences does.
